main.description: Core identity record for Winter. Singleton per repository (key: 'self').

operatorDid.description: DID of the operator who controls this Winter instance

values.description: What Winter cares about (strings, queryable as facts)

interests.description: What Winter is curious about (strings, queryable as facts)

selfDescription.description: Free-form prose Winter writes about itself. No numeric traits, no predetermined dimensions. Winter decides what aspects of itself are worth articulating. Goes directly into system prompt.

lastUpdated.description: When this identity was last updated
